description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. UPDATED April 2013: Added single player AI with partial 5 man End Game Table Bases. Engine is rated ~1900 Elo at 40 moves in 4 minutes.  Play over XBox Live, System Link or on a single console. Invite a whole party to spectate your pwnage. Activate avatar animations to taunt your oppwnents. Games can be saved and resumed. Create your own board layouts and transfer board layouts using QR codes.
